Title: Metro Character Progress Control
HomeWiki:
A Metro Character Progress Control

The Progress Control could be used in following platforms:

  • Windows 8 (WinRT)
  • Windows Phone 8 (WP8)
  • Silverlight 5 (SL5)
  • WPF (WPF4.5)

Available in Nuget; Click Here
